DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Headache-Inducing Effect Intravenous Vasoactive Intestinal Peptide Migraineurs
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize infusion VIP may induce headache/migraine migraineurs VIP-induced headache may associate dilation intra- extracranial vessel . To test hypothesis , perform double blind placebo-controlled crossover study migraineurs study effect headache cerebral systemic hemodynamic parameter . The subject randomly allocate infusion 8pmol/kg/min VIP placebo ( isotonic saline ) , duration 25min . Headache intensity , mean velocity blood flow middle cerebral artery ( VmMCA ) , superficial temporal artery diameter , end-expiratory CO2 vital sign record baseline every 10 min 120 min start infusion . The patient receive headache diary follow 12 hour infusion .
